an3.35:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava alaviyam viharati gomagge simsapavane pannasanthare.
an3.35:1.3: Atha kho hatthako alavako janghaviharam anucankamamano anuvicaramano addasa bhagavantam gomagge simsapavane pannasanthare nisinnam.
an3.35:1.4: Disva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho hatthako alavako bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.35:1.7: Ye ca pana loke sukham senti, aham tesam annataro”ti.
an3.35:2.1: “Sita, bhante, hemantika ratti, antaratthako himapatasamayo, khara gokantakahata bhumi, tanuko pannasantharo, viralani rukkhassa pattani, sitani kasayani vatthani, sito ca verambho vato vayati.
an3.35:2.4: Ye ca pana loke sukham senti, aham tesam annataro’”ti.
an3.35:3.1: “Tena hi, kumara, tannevettha patipucchissami. Yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasi.
an3.35:3.2: Tam kim mannasi, kumara, idhassa gahapatissa va gahapatiputtassa va kutagaram ullittavalittam nivatam phusitaggalam pihitavatapanam.
an3.35:3.3: Tatrassa pallanko gonakatthato patikatthato patalikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccattharano sauttaracchado ubhato lohitakupadhano;
an3.35:3.5: catasso ca pajapatiyo manapamanapena paccupatthita assu.
an3.35:3.6: Tam kim mannasi, kumara, sukham va so sayeyya no va?
an3.35:3.9: Ye ca pana loke sukham senti, so tesam annataro”ti.
an3.35:4.2: api nu tassa gahapatissa va gahapatiputtassa va uppajjeyyum ragaja parilaha kayika va cetasika va yehi so ragajehi parilahehi paridayhamano dukkham sayeyya”ti?
an3.35:5.1: “Yehi kho so, kumara, gahapati va gahapatiputto va ragajehi parilahehi paridayhamano dukkham sayeyya, so rago tathagatassa pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo.
an3.35:6.2: api nu tassa gahapatissa va gahapatiputtassa va uppajjeyyum dosaja parilaha …pe…
an3.35:6.3: mohaja parilaha kayika va cetasika va yehi so mohajehi parilahehi paridayhamano dukkham sayeyya”ti?
an3.35:7.1: “Ye hi kho so, kumara, gahapati va gahapatiputto va mohajehi parilahehi paridayhamano dukkham sayeyya, so moho tathagatassa pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo.
